page.title: 07SERVICES TO LITTLE MILL
page.content: When the village shop closed it was missed particularly by the elderly and those who had no private transport. Since,mobile traders have provided some services.As well as daily milk delivery the milkman sells eggs,cream, juices,newspapers and magazines. Three times weekly the baker calls. A grocer delivers orders and a butcher visits specified sites weekly.Coal is delivered fortnightly and a hardware van sells paraffin,detergents and other household items. Refuse collections are weekly from our gateways. A very reliable window cleaner calls once a fortnight, weather permitting.A baby clinc and a chiropody service for senior citizens are run monthly by the Health Authority. The mobile library van visits each week.
